title: How To Defend Freedom Like A Machiavellian

content: COVID will lead to a vast increase in surveillance. Here's how to roll it back when the crisis subsidesScary headline number one: How the coronavirus could trigger a backslide on freedom around the worldThe Washington Post, March 16. Scary headline number two… [+9187 chars]
